net.happybrackets.core.control

Class TriggerControlSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.happybrackets.core.control.TriggerControl
      • net.happybrackets.core.control.TriggerControlSender

  • public class TriggerControlSender
extends TriggerControl
    This class is used for only sending values and does not implement a listener Performing a send will perform a trigger on other controls with the same name

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TriggerControlSender(java.lang.Object parent_sketch, java.lang.String name)
      Create a Trigger Dynamic Control
